aboutMe.subtitle: About me
aboutMe.descriptionText: Hi, I’m a German, English-speaking Frontend Developer based in Münster. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
aboutMe.flexibleText: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can relocate and work effectively on-site or remotely.
aboutMe.openMindedText: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
aboutMe.creativeProblemSolvingText: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

skills.subtitle: Skill Set
skills.descriptionText: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to continuously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
skills.question: You need
skills.answerText: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

projects.subtitle: Featured Projects
projects.descriptionText: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action

join.description: A task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop functions, assign users and categories.

loctarRisen.description: An object-oriented jump, run, and throw game. Guide Scarr the orc through obstacles, collect coins and axes, and defeat the troll to uncover treasure for his family.

daBubble.description: This app is a Slack clone app. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

testimonials.title: What my colleagues say about me
testimonials.sBoese: Working with Michael Krämer has been an absolute pleasure. Their attention to detail and ability to transform complex requirements into elegant, user-friendly designs is truly impressive. They are a key contributor to our teams success.
testimonials.aButalov: Michael Krämer consistently delivers high-quality frontend solutions, meeting deadlines and exceeding expectations. Their creativity and problem-solving skills make them an indispensable asset to our projects.
testimonials.lStanislav: As a fellow frontend developer, I admire Michael Krämers dedication to clean, efficient code and innovative design. Their collaborative spirit and passion for crafting seamless user experiences are second to none.

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.introText1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

inputEmail.label: What's your email?
inputEmail.error: Please provide your email so I can reach out to you.
inputEmail.errorMessage: Please enter a valid email address.

inputMessage.label: How can I help you?
inputMessage.placeholder: Hello Michael, I am interested in...
inputMessage.error: What do you need to develop?
inputMessage.errorMessage: Please enter a message with at least 10 letters

privacyPolicy.labelPartTwo: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

contact.submitConfirmation: Thank you for getting in touch! Your message has been successfully received, and I will respond as soon as possible.

privacyPolicy.general_info_text: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified. For detailed information on the topic of data protection, please refer to our privacy policy below this text.
privacyPolicy.responsible_party_title: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
privacyPolicy.responsible_party_text: The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the section 'Notice on the Responsible Authority' in this privacy policy.
privacyPolicy.data_collection_method_title: How do we collect your data?
privacyPolicy.data_collection_method_text1: Your data is collected on one hand by you providing it to us. This can be data that you enter into a contact form, for example.
privacyPolicy.data_collection_method_text2: Other data is collected automatically or with your consent when you visit the website through our IT systems. This primarily includes technical data (e.g., Internet browser, operating system, or time of page view). This data is collected automatically as soon as you enter this website.
privacyPolicy.data_usage_title: What do we use your data for?
privacyPolicy.data_usage_text: Some of the data is collected to ensure that the website is provided without errors. Other data can be used to analyze your user behavior.
privacyPolicy.user_rights_title: What rights do you have regarding your data?
privacyPolicy.user_rights_text1: You have the right to receive information free of charge at any time about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data.
privacyPolicy.user_rights_text2: You also have the right to request the rectification or deletion of this data.
privacyPolicy.user_rights_text3: If you have given consent for data processing, you can revoke this consent at any time for the future.
privacyPolicy.user_rights_text4: Furthermore, you have the right to request the restriction of processing your personal data under certain circumstances.
privacyPolicy.user_rights_text5: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.
privacyPolicy.hosting_intro_text: We host the contents of our website with the following provider:
privacyPolicy.hosting_provider_text: The provider is ALL-INKL.COM - Neue Medien Münnich, Inh. René Münnich, Hauptstraße 68, 02742 Friedersdorf (hereinafter All-Inkl). For details, see the privacy policy of All-Inkl:
privacyPolicy.hosting_use_text: The use of All-Inkl is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR. We have a legitimate interest in a reliable representation of our website. If consent has been obtained, the processing is carried out exclusively based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR and § 25 para. 1 TDDG, as far as the consent includes the storage of cookies or access to information on the user's device (e.g., device fingerprinting) in the sense of TDDG. Consent can be revoked at any time.
privacyPolicy.data_protection_text1: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy.
privacyPolicy.data_protection_text2: When you use this website, various personal data is collected. Personal data is data that can be used to identify you personally. This privacy policy explains what data we collect and how we use it. It also explains how and for what purpose this happens.
privacyPolicy.data_protection_text3: We would like to point out that data transmission over the Internet (e.g., when communicating via email) may have security vulnerabilities. A complete protection of the data against access by third parties is not possible.
privacyPolicy.responsible_entity_text: The responsible party is the natural or legal person who alone or jointly with others decides on the purposes and means of processing personal data (e.g. names, email addresses, etc.).
privacyPolicy.storage_duration_text: Unless a more specific storage period has been specified in this privacy policy, your personal data will remain with us until the purpose for processing the data no longer applies...
privacyPolicy.general_legal_basis_title: General information on the legal basis for data processing on this website
privacyPolicy.general_legal_basis_text: If you have consented to the processing of your personal data, we process your data based on Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR or Art. 9(2)(a) GDPR if special categories of data are processed...
privacyPolicy.recipients_text: In the course of our business activities, we work with various external parties. In some cases, it is also necessary to transmit personal data to these external parties...
privacyPolicy.consent_revocation_title: Revocation of your consent to data processing
privacyPolicy.consent_revocation_text: Many data processing operations are only possible with your express consent. You may revoke your consent at any time...
privacyPolicy.objection_rights_title: Right to object to data collection in special cases and to direct marketing (Art. 21 GDPR)
privacyPolicy.objection_rights_text1: IF THE DATA PROCESSING IS BASED ON ART. 6(1)(E) OR (F) GDPR, YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO OBJECT TO THE PROCESSING OF YOUR PERSONAL DATA AT ANY TIME FOR REASONS ARISING FROM YOUR PARTICULAR SITUATION...
privacyPolicy.objection_rights_text2: IF YOUR PERSONAL DATA IS PROCESSED FOR DIRECT MARKETING PURPOSES, YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO OBJECT AT ANY TIME TO THE PROCESSING OF PERSONAL DATA CONCERNING YOU FOR THE PURPOSE OF SUCH MARKETING...
privacyPolicy.complaint_right_title: Right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority
privacyPolicy.complaint_right_text: In the event of breaches of the GDPR, data subjects have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, in particular in the member state of their habitual residence, place of work, or the place of the alleged infringement...
privacyPolicy.data_portability_right_text: You have the right to have data that we process based on your consent or in fulfillment of a contract automatically handed over to you or a third party in a common, machine-readable format...
privacyPolicy.access_correction_deletion_text: Within the framework of the applicable legal provisions, you have the right to request information free of charge about your stored personal data at any time...
privacyPolicy.processing_restriction_text_intro: You have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data. You can contact us at any time for this. The right to restriction of processing exists in the following cases:
privacyPolicy.processing_restriction_case1: If you contest the accuracy of your personal data stored by us, we usually need time to verify this...
privacyPolicy.processing_restriction_case2: If the processing of your personal data was/is unlawful, you can request the restriction of data processing instead of deletion...
privacyPolicy.processing_restriction_case3: If we no longer need your personal data, but you need it to exercise, defend or assert legal claims...
privacyPolicy.processing_restriction_case4: If you have lodged an objection under Art. 21(1) GDPR, a balance must be struck between your interests and ours...
privacyPolicy.processing_restriction_text: If you have restricted the processing of your personal data, this data – apart from its storage – may only be processed with your consent or for the assertion, exercise, or defense of legal claims...
privacyPolicy.ssl_tls_text1: For security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, this site uses SSL or TLS encryption...
privacyPolicy.ssl_tls_text2: When SSL or TLS encryption is activated, the data you transmit to us cannot be read by third parties.
privacyPolicy.advertising_email_objection_text: We hereby object to the use of contact data published as part of the legal notice obligation for sending unsolicited advertising and information materials...
privacyPolicy.server_log_text: The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us. These are:
privacyPolicy.server_log_hostname: Host name of the accessing computer
privacyPolicy.server_log_conclusion: This data will not be merged with other data sources. The collection of this data is based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR...
privacyPolicy.contact_form_text1: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your details from the inquiry form, including the contact details you provide, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry...
privacyPolicy.contact_form_text2: The data you enter in the contact form will remain with us until you request deletion or the purpose for data storage no longer applies...
privacyPolicy.contact_request_title: Request by email, telephone or fax
privacyPolicy.contact_request_text: If you contact us by email, telephone or fax, your inquiry, including all resulting personal data (name, inquiry) will be stored and processed by us for the purpose of handling your request...
